sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_NAME as name, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_MODIFYUSER as modifyuser, C_MODIFYTIME as modifytime, C_DESCRIPTION as description, C_PRICE as price, C_STARTPRICE as startprice, C_PROPRICE as proprice, C_PREDESC as predesc, C_CITYID as cityid, C_STARTRANGE as startrange, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID as customeragentid, C_STARTDATE as startdate, C_IMAGE as image, C_ENDCITYID as endcityid, C_UCODE as ucode, C_LANGUAGE as language, C_TYPEID as typeid, C_LONGNAME as longname from T_TRIPLINE where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_TRIPLINE ( ID, C_NAME, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_MODIFYUSER, C_MODIFYTIME, C_DESCRIPTION, C_PRICE, C_STARTPRICE, C_PROPRICE, C_PREDESC, C_CITYID, C_STARTRANGE, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID, C_STARTDATE, C_IMAGE, C_ENDCITYID, C_UCODE, C_LANGUAGE, C_TYPEID, C_LONGNAME ) values (
#id#,
#name#,
#createuser#,
#createtime#,
#modifyuser#,
#modifytime#,
#description#,
#price:DECIMAL#,
#startprice:DECIMAL#,
#proprice:DECIMAL#,
#predesc#,
#cityid:DECIMAL#,
#startrange#,
#customeragentid:DECIMAL#,
#startdate#,
#image#,
#endcityid:DECIMAL#,
#ucode:DECIMAL#,
#language:DECIMAL#,
#typeid:DECIMAL#,
#longname#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_TRIPLINE set C_NAME = #name#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_MODIFYUSER = #modifyuser#, C_MODIFYTIME = #modifytime#, C_DESCRIPTION = #description#, C_PRICE = #price:DECIMAL#, C_STARTPRICE = #startprice:DECIMAL#, C_PROPRICE = #proprice:DECIMAL#, C_PREDESC = #predesc#, C_CITYID = #cityid:DECIMAL#, C_STARTRANGE = #startrange#, C_CUSTOMERAGENTID = #customeragentid:DECIMAL#, C_STARTDATE = #startdate#, C_IMAGE = #image#, C_ENDCITYID = #endcityid:DECIMAL#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#, C_TYPEID = #typeid:DECIMAL#, C_LONGNAME=#longname#
where ID = #id#
